elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Describe the following terms that are important in connection with sales costing.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Overheads
elements.correctAnswer: Costs that cannot be directly allocated to an item

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Cost price
elements.correctAnswer: Price that covers all costs (no profit and no loss)

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Net profit
elements.correctAnswer: Net profit is the difference between income and expenses.
